text.en: Namo guru vajrasatvāya!
Embodiment of the enlightened body, speech, mind, qualities and activity
text.en-trans: chok chu dü zhi namdren sé ché kyi

text.en: Of all the guides and their heirs throughout the ten directions and four times,
text.en-trans: ku sung tuk yön trinlé ngowo nyi

text.en: Great treasure-revealing Vajradhara, who personifies all sources of refuge,
text.en-trans: kyabné kündü terchen dorjé chang

text.en: I call to you from the depths of my heart: look with your wisdom vision!
text.en-trans: nying né bö do yeshe chen gyi zik

text.en: With unwavering devotion, I pay homage to and take refuge in you.
text.en-trans: miché güpé chaktsal kyab su chi

text.en: Withholding nothing, I offer body, possessions and accumulated virtue.
text.en-trans: lü dang longchö gé tsok tömé bul

text.en: As I confess my impairments of vows and samaya commitments,
text.en-trans: dom dang damtsik nyampa tol shak na

text.en: Please grant the supreme attainment of unobscured purity!
text.en-trans: dribmé tsangpa chok gi ngödrub tsol

text.en: All of us, your students and upholders of your lineage,
text.en-trans: dakchak gyü dzin lobmar ché nam kün

text.en: Have no other refuge but you, O protector,
text.en-trans: gönpo khyö lé kyab zhen machipé

text.en: So remain forever in the indestructible sphere in the centre of our hearts,
text.en-trans: nying ü mishik tikler tak zhuk né

text.en: And confer the great blessing of the merger of our minds and your wisdom.
text.en-trans: tuk yi chik tu drepé jin chen pob

text.en: In the short term, with all hindrances to the practice of Dharma pacified,
text.en-trans: nekab damchö drubpé galkyen zhi

text.en: And all favourable circumstances present in abundance,
text.en-trans: tünkyen malü pünsum tsokpa dang

text.en: May all our positive wholesome acts, however many there may be,
text.en-trans: nampar karwé lek jé jinyé kyi

text.en: Contribute to the complete fulfilment of your enlightened aspirations, O protector!
text.en-trans: gön khyö tukgong yongsu dzokpar shok

text.en: Ultimately, bless us, so that in the pure realm Lotus-Covered,
text.en-trans: tartuk pemé khebpé zhingkham su

text.en: Where you are the bodhisattva Padme Nyugu ('Budding Lotus'),
text.en-trans: changsem khyuchok pemé nyugu dang

text.en: We all—teacher and retinue—become united in realization
text.en-trans: tönkhor gongpa yermé chik gyur té

text.en: And act as guides for all beings, as infinite as space in number.
text.en-trans: khanyam dro kün drenpar jingyi lob

text.en: May we be cared for by the gurus, who are all victorious ones in person,
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün ngö lamé jesu zung

text.en: May the lotus feet of the victorious ones’ heirs remain secure for a hundred aeons,
text.en-trans: gyalwé sepo zhabpé kal gyar ten

text.en: May the immaculate activity of teaching and practice spread everywhere, far and wide,
text.en-trans: gyalkham drimé shedrub trinlé gyé

text.en: And may auspiciousness, well-being and positivity flourish throughout the land!
text.en-trans: gyalkham küntu tashi delek shok
